        public boolean displayRemoveResult​(Dvd removedDvd)
        Shows to the user if the DVD removal was a success or not. Then will ask if they want to remove another dvd or not
        Parameters:
        removedDvd - the DVD the user wants to be removed
        Returns:
        Boolean of whether the user want to remove another dvd

        Returns:

      • displayEditDvdFoundResult

        public boolean displayEditDvdFoundResult​(Dvd editDvd)
        Shows after the user has chosen the dvd to edit from DVD ID. It wll say if the dvd exists in the library. If it doesn't, it will ask the user whether they want to find another DVD or continue with the null
        Parameters:
        editDvd - the DVD the user wants to edit
        Returns:
        Boolean of whether to repeat the search

      • setNewMediaInfo

        public Dvd setNewMediaInfo​(Dvd editDvd,
                           int infoToEdit)
        Edits the info of a DVD based on the infoToEdit 1. Title 2. Release Date 3. MPAA Rating 4. Director's name 5. Studio 6. User Notes 7. No info is edited
        Parameters:
        editDvd - DVD to be edited
        infoToEdit - the info which wants to be edited
        Returns:
        the DVD after the edit

      • displayEditInfoResult

        public boolean displayEditInfoResult​(Dvd editDvd)
        Shows to the user the DVD has been edited. Then will ask if they want to edit the same DVD again
        Parameters:
        editDvd - the DVD the user has edited
        Returns:
        Boolean of whether the user want to edit the DVD again

      • displayEditDvdResult

        public boolean displayEditDvdResult()

        Returns:
        Boolean of whether the user want to edit another DVD

      • repeatAction

        public boolean repeatAction​(java.lang.String prompt)
        Prompts user if they want to repeat the action they have just done and returns a boolean true and false
        Parameters:
        prompt - what action the user wants to repeat, "Do you want to "+ prompt+ "? (y or n)"
        Returns:
        true and false whether the user wants to repeat the action
